meanings.sent1: The bird flew skywards to reach its nest.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks shot skywards, lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The kite soared skywards, almost touching the clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits lifted skywards as she gazed at the stars.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon ascended skywards, painting a colorful picture in the sky.

meanings.definition: In the direction of the sky.
meanings.sent1: The rocket launched skywards with a loud roar.
meanings.sent2: The climber looked skywards, preparing to scale the steep cliff.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick made the card disappear skywards.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper seemed to stretch skywards endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower turned its face skywards, following the path of the sun.
